subject: Hammer Time
event: The good folks at Valyrian Steel have announced that they are now taking preorders for their massive, gorgeous replica of King Robert's warhammer. http://www.valyriansteel.com/shop/swords/king-roberts-warhammer/prod_14.html Do note: these are preorders only. The hammer has not yet gone into production, and will not be shipping until Spring 2012. Questions and comments should go Valyrian Steel. Thanks.
